title: Pie Charts
alt: If you can't get your graphing tool to do the shading, just add some clip art of cosmologists discussing the unusual curvature of space in the area.
transcript:
[Two colored circles are shown. The circle on the right is warped and bent in shape and shows some shadows from the middle to the outer edges, like a round piece of cloth with wrinkles going out from the center.][The left pie chart:]

How to make a pie chart if your percentages don't add up to 100
